data.actual_result: User still logs in, skipping the login window, back to HypeSquad page with you still logged in (notice the 'open' button on the top right, not 'login')
data.expected_result: You logged out and the login window with id/password prompt is shown
data.short_description: When you press logout from HypeSquad apply modal, the user doesn't completely logout
data.steps_to_repro: - Open HypeSquad website (make sure you have logged in before opening the page) - Click 'Apply Now', press Logout - observe
